Meet the author

Meet the Author: Dame Hilary Mantel

Written by Brandon King · Published Nov 22, 2016

Dame Hilary Mantel tells us why she chose to write about Thomas Cromwell, the advantages of writing short stories in the first person, and the importance of using, celebrating and promoting your local library.

Meet the Author: Lisa Hilton

Written by Brandon King · Published Nov 8, 2016

Lisa Hilton discusses her admiration for John Donne and Evelyn Waugh, changing style with her psychological thriller Maestra, and her experience as a teenage library assistant.

Meet the Author: Deborah Moggach

Written by Brandon King · Published Oct 31, 2016

Deborah discusses her childhood love for Just William, the pleasure of having her novel These Foolish Things adapted into The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel, and the challenge of adapting Pride and Prejudice for the big screen.

Meet the Author: Jodi Picoult

Written by Brandon King · Published Oct 19, 2016

Jodi discusses co-writing with her daughter, switching off from work, and her new novel, Small Great Things.

Meet the Author: Jilly Cooper

Written by Brandon King · Published Oct 6, 2016

Jilly discusses the latest Rutshire Chronicles novel and her love of Suffolk.

Meet the Author: Alan Johnson

Written by Brandon King · Published Sep 22, 2016

Brandon interviews the former postman and chancellor, author of an acclaimed set of memoirs and special guest at our annual book festival, Bookfest.

Meet the Author: Peter May

Written by Brandon King · Published Sep 7, 2016

Brandon King interviews The Lewis Trilogy author Peter May.

Meet the Author: Paula Hawkins

Written by Brandon King · Published Aug 25, 2016

Brandon King interviews The Girl on the Train author Paula Hawkins.

Meet the Author: Rose Tremain

Written by Brandon King · Published Aug 16, 2016

Brandon King interviews Whitbread winner Rose Tremain.

Written by Brandon King · Published Aug 2, 2016

Brandon King interviews Alexander McCall Smith.

Brandon King interviews Catherine Banner.

Written by Brandon King · Published Jul 19, 2016

Brandon King interviews thriller novelist, Tess Gerritsen.

Meet the author: Ruth Ware

Written by Brandon King · Published Jul 5, 2016

Brandon King interviews Ruth Ware, author of thriller In a Dark, Dark Wood.

Meet the author: Jane Smiley

Written by Brandon King · Published Jun 27, 2016

Brandon King interviews author of the Pulitzer-prize winning book A Thousand Acres.

Meet the author: Mary Balogh

Written by Brandon King · Published Jun 17, 2016

Brandon King interviews romance author Mary Balogh.

Meet the author: Peter James

Written by Brandon King · Published Jun 7, 2016

Brandon King interviews crime author Peter James about his new books, Love You Dead and Death Comes Knocking: Policing Roy Grace’s Brighton.

Meet the author: Lee Child

Written by Brandon King · Published May 31, 2016

Our most popular author discusses libraries, Jack Reacher and Robin Hood, and Aston Villa.

Meet the author: Susie Steiner

Written by Brandon King · Published May 24, 2016

Brandon King interviews journalist-turned-author Susie Steiner.

Brandon interviews the popular classicist, Professor Mary Beard.

Meet the author: Julia Blackburn
